name: email
description: The email address to use when registering the user as a site member.

name: password
description: The password the newly added site member will use to log in.

name: emails
description: List of contact's email addresses. When creating a contactzCOMMAz if no phone number is providedzCOMMAz at least one email address must be provided.

name: loginEmail
description: Email address the contact who is also a member uses to log into the system.

name: phones
description: List of contact's phone numbers. When creating a contactzCOMMAz if no email is providedzCOMMAz at least one phone number must be provided.

name: labels
description: List of contact's labels. Labels are used to organize contacts. When setting the labels propertyzCOMMAz you can only list labels that already exist in your site's Contacts List.

name: customFields
description: Any number of custom fields. Customs fields are used to store additional information about your site's contacts. When setting a custom fieldzCOMMAz use key:value pairs where the key matches the names defined in your site's Contacts List. You can only set values for custom fields that already exist in the Contacts application.
